title: Rituals | LightHouse Healing
cleaned_text: top of page CRYSTALS WHERE THE MAGIC BEGINS Rituals: Welcome Crystals are said to "have a stable and unchanging energy pattern, each with a unique frequency and energy field, or resonance" that gives them their special properties. As a result, "they act like tuning forks," helping bring "harmony" to the "very unstable energy field of the human body". Crystals are known to have their own special energies that align to different areas of your life, with their shape and colour - as well as their type - affecting their influence. Rituals: About Rituals: Product Gallery bottom of page
